alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 10:23PM EDT until June 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1023 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dreher Island State Park, or near Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Irmo, Forest Acres, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Ballentine, Dreher Island State Park, Chapin, Oswald Park, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, Rocky Point Recreation Area, Cedar Creek Fire Station, Hollow Creek Public Park and Melvin Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 60 and 71. Interstate 26 between mile markers 92 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Murray move away from the water and take shelter!
